column3: News;Kampot: On the morning of December 9
column4: police received news that a foreigner had died at MAGIC SPONGE guesthouse in Kampot City.------Police say the victim
column8: died in the courtyard in front of the guesthouse. It is believed he fell 10 metres from the top floor.------Currently
column9: the authorities are investigating  and asking for any witnesses to come forward.------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/137597------WARNING- pixelled out photos of scene:------Rasmei News
